item.title: Caipirinha
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml cachaça
  • 1/2 lime
  • 15 ml sugar syrup

Instructions

Muddle quartered lime and syrup in a rocks glass. Add ice and cachaça and stir.

item.title: Cosmopolitan
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml vodka (citron)
  • 30 ml triple sec
  • 30 ml lime juice
  • 15 ml cranberry juice
  • (garnish) lemon twist

Instructions

Shake ingredients with ice. Serve in a cocktail glass. Garnish.

item.title: Cube libre
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml rum
  • 90 ml cola
  • 5 ml lime juice
  • (garnish) lime wedge

Instructions

Build in highball glass over ice. Garnish.

item.title: Daiquiri
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml rum
  • 20 ml lime juice
  • 10 ml sugar syrup
  • lime zest
  • (garnish) lime slice

Instructions

Shake ingredients with ice. Serve in a cocktail glass. Garnish.

item.title: Hemingway special
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml rum
  • 30 ml grapefruit juice
  • 15 ml lime juice
  • 15 ml Maraschino liqueur
  • 5 ml sugar syrup
  • (garnish) lime slice

Instructions

Shake ingredients with ice. Serve in a cocktail glass. Garnish.

item.title: Margarita
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml tequila
  • 30 ml lime juice
  • 15 ml triple sec
  • (garnish) lime slice

Instructions

Rim cocktail glass with salt. Shake ingredients with ice. Serve in cocktail glass. Garnish.

item.title: Mojito
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml rum
  • 20 ml lime juice
  • 20 ml sugar syrup
  • a few mint leaves
  • soda water
  • (garnish) mint sprig

Instructions

Crush ice in clean tea towel. Lightly clap mint. Add ingredients except soda to highball glass. Add crushed ice and stir briefly, and top with soda water. Garnish.

item.title: Paloma
item.description:
You can make the drink fancy by substituting the grapefruit soda for a combination of grapefruit juice, agave syrup, and soda water.

Ingredients

  • 60 ml tequila
  • 120 ml grapefruit soda
  • 5 ml lime juice
  • pinch of salt
  • (garnish) lime wedge

Instructions

Mix together in a highball glass over ice. Garnish.

item.title: Pisco sour
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 45 ml pisco
  • 30 ml lime juice
  • 15 ml sugar syrup
  • 1/2 egg white
  • (garnish) aromatic bitters
  • (garnish) lime slice

Instructions

Dry shake ingredients. Then shake with ice. Serve in a rocks glass without ice. Garnish with drops of bitters and a lime slice.

item.title: Southside
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml gin
  • 30 ml lime juice
  • 15 ml sugar syrup
  • 1 mint sprig
  • (garnish) 1 mint leaf

Instructions

Shake ingredients with ice. Serve in a cocktail glass. Garnish.
